benchmark_details.name: InsQABench (Insurance Question Answering Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: InsQABench is a benchmark dataset for the Chinese insurance sector structured into three categories: Insurance Commonsense Knowledge, Insurance Structured Database, and Insurance Unstructured Documents, reflecting real-world insurance question-answering tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a comprehensive benchmark dataset for insurance-related question answering.

data.source: Collection of insurance-related information from various insurance company official websites and public online resources.
data.annotation: QA pairs generated through a combination of automated methods and manual input from domain experts.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation metrics calculated comparing model output against benchmark standards.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate a more accurate and professional response related to insurance questions.
methodology.validation: Two-stage evaluation assessing model performance before and after fine-tuning on benchmark.
